meanings.definition: A piece of writing, image, or other item of content published online.
meanings.sent1: I read an interesting postin on the blog.
meanings.sent2: She shared a funny postin on her social media.
meanings.sent3: The postin about cats made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her postin was a window into her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The postin was full of beautiful pictures.

meanings.definition: To display or publish something on a website or social media platform.
meanings.sent1: He will postin his artwork on the website.
meanings.sent2: They always postin updates on their social media.
meanings.sent3: I will postin the recipe for everyone to see.
meanings.sent4: She postin her travel adventures for all to enjoy.

meanings.definition: The act of sending a letter or package through the mail.
meanings.sent1: I dropped the postin in the mailbox.

meanings.sent3: The postin arrived earlier than expected.

meanings.definition: A job or position within an organization or company.
meanings.sent1: She applied for a postin at the company.
